text: @JoshNBCNews @PressSec Is anyone really surprised that they are denying this?  Just like pence yesterday got up on that stage and said basically that everything was okay in regards to the Coronavirus.  3,2,1...  when someone chimes in to say that they were briefed back in March but didn't care.
